name: Identify IR Beams
description: The DEXI Drone identifies IR beams around the railway to locate damaged areas.

name: Recognize April Tags
description: The DEXI Drone recognizes April Tags to identify which colored Conex Tool Box is needed.

name: Sphero Technician Travels
description: Sphero Technicians travel from the Tech Center to the Container Yard.

name: RVR Loader Autonomy
description: RVR Loader drives autonomously from Tech Center to Container Yard using color square navigation.

name: Sphero Boarding and Exiting
description: Sphero Technicians board and exit the Conex Tool Boxes.

name: Deliver Conex Tool Box to Railway
description: The AVR Drone delivers Conex Tool Boxes to railway parking spots.

name: Activate Repair Switch Buttons
description: Sphero Technicians activate repair switch buttons to repair the railway.

name: Activate Train Start Button
description: A Sphero Technician activates the red switch button to start the train.

name: Identify IR Beams
description: The DEXI Drone identifies IR beams along the bridge to locate cracked areas.

name: Recognize April Tags
description: The DEXI Drone recognizes April Tags to identify which colored Conex Tool Box is needed.

name: Sphero Boarding and Exiting
description: Sphero Technicians board and exit the Conex Tool Boxes.

name: Deliver Conex Tool Box to Bridge
description: The AVR Drone delivers Conex Tool Boxes to bridge parking spots.

name: Travel to Work Space
description: Sphero Technicians travel to the work space adjacent to the identified cracked areas.

name: Laser Weld Cracked Areas
description: The DEXI Drone activates the laser to weld cracks, requiring 5 laser hits per area.

name: Return to Container Yard
description: Sphero Technicians return to the container yard after completing tasks.

name: Identify Hot Spots
description: The AVR Drone identifies hot spots on the power pole transformers using a thermal camera.

name: Recognize April Tags
description: The DEXI Drone recognizes April Tags to determine which colored Conex Tool Box is needed.

name: Deliver Conex Tool Box to Power Pole
description: The RVR Loader delivers Conex Tool Boxes to the identified power pole parking spots.

name: Reset Paddle Switch
description: Sphero Technicians reset the paddle switch to repair the transformers.

name: Park RVR Loader
description: The RVR Loader returns to the starting position.

name: Park Sphero Technicians
description: Sphero Technicians return to the tech center building.

name: Park DEXI Drone
description: The DEXI Drone lands at the designated helipad.

name: Park AVR Drone
description: The AVR Drone lands at the designated helipad.

name: Return Conex Tool Boxes
description: Conex Tool Boxes are returned to the container yard.
